page.title: 16BROWNBREAD STREET
page.content: Brownbread Street, one of the hamlets making up the village of Ashburnham is centred round the Ash Tree Inn and Street Farm. A cluster of houses and a horse stud complete the picture. Where the Street joins the Ninfield-Woods Corner road is a second hamlet, Ponts Green, with its small engineering repair garage,taxi service, Post Office & General Stores, Petrol Station, farms, houses and cottages with a Chapel making a compact community. In this part of the Ashburnham Village can be found the old village school now converted to a Village Hall. The area is mainly pasturage for sheep and cattle.
